title: Domestic passenger vehicle sales up 4% in May at 3,47,492 units: SIAM
description: India's passenger vehicle wholesales increased by 4% YoY to 3,47,492 units in May, according to SIAM. The overall dispatches from companies to dealers reached 3,34,537 units. Two-wheeler sales rose 10% to 16,20,084 units, while three-wheeler dispatches rose 15% to 55,763 units.
